sentence: Indeed, recently discovered somatic mutations in IDH1/2, ATRX, CIC, and FUBP1 have dramatically altered conceptions of low-grade gliomagenesis while also informing more robust diagnostic classification schemes (Fig. 1).
Regardless, the mutual exclusivity that exists between ATRX and CIC/FUBP1 mutations in IDH-mutant LGGs forms the foundation of an improved classification scheme (Fig. 1).
